title: Will Saffron Barker dance in Strictly this weekend despite back injury?
text:
Saffron Barker had to quit Strictly rehearsals earlier this week (Picture: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

Saffron Barker’s Strictly Come Dancing journey looked like it might be in jeopardy earlier this week when the YouTube star revealed that ‘crippling pain’ had forced her to cut one of her rehearsals with AJ Pritchard short this week.

The 20-year-old YouTuber took to Instagram to update fans on her rehearsals and admitted she’d had to stop rehearsing because of pain in her back that forced her to stop dancing.

Saffron, who is set to perform the Foxtrot on Saturday with AJ, revealed that she suffered the back injury during her well-received contemporary dance performance last week.

In a clip from training, she said: ‘I’m actually in so much pain. I really hurt my back on Saturday. We actually can’t get through today. We can’t do it.’

Then, later on in the evening, Saffron revealed that the pain in her back had been keeping her up all night.

Advertisement

Advertisement

So, will Saffron be able to dance in Strictly this weekend after being forced to quit rehearsals earlier this week?

Will Saffron Barker dance in Strictly this weekend?

Despite her injury, Saffron appears to be persevering with rehearsals, suggesting that she will indeed dance in Strictly as normal this Saturday with AJ.

After sharing a picture of her on her way to rehearsals armed with Deep Heat to help manage her pain, the star appeared on her social media again to update fans on her progress: ‘Even though I have been in so much pain, we have got through this dance and we do officially know it from beginning to end,’ Saffron revealed to camera on her Instagram stories.

Saffron is hoping Deep Heat will help her ‘crippling pain’ (Picture:@saffronbarker)

‘I’ve dosed up on tablets and I’ve got the heat pads on at all times,’ Saffron said.

‘I think it’s going to be the most fun dance we’ve done yet,’ she concluded.

‘I’m excited for it, just don’t drop the cane,’ AJ deadpanned to camera in the background.

Saffron and AJ will hopefully appear as normal on Saturday night’s show (Picture:Ray Burmiston/BBC)

Saffron will be dancing to Frank Sinatra’s classic tune New York, New York this weekend and Strictly pro AJ has choreographed a fitting Foxtrot using canes which, to impress the judges, they will throw to one another during the routine.

Strictly Come Dancing airs on Saturday evenings on BBC One.

description: Saffron Barker's Strictly Come Dancing journey looked like it might be in jeopardy earlier this week as the star suffered ‘crippling pain’.
